app_descript:
School of Dragons: How to Train Your Dragon

Experience the thrill of the popular DreamWorks franchise with "School of Dragons," where you immerse yourself into the world of Berk and become the ultimate dragon trainer. As a cross-platform game designed to work on both mobile devices and computers, School of Dragons allows you to dive into a fantastical land with diverse activities ranging from dragon racing to farming. Join renowned characters like Toothless and Hiccup on challenging quests as you forge your path to glory.
